algorithm_technique: Binary search on font sizes, check function uses character counts and font info.
problem_summary_simple: Find the largest font size from a given list that fits a sentence within screen dimensions.
problem_summary_technical: Binary search over available font sizes. For each size, calculate text width using character counts and FontInfo, checking against screen width and height.
key_insights: The problem has a monotonic property: if a font size fits, all smaller sizes also fit.
Binary search is efficient for finding the maximum fitting font size.
Pre-calculating character counts optimizes width calculation.
